headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://images.unsplash.com; connect-src 'self' https://searx.be
